dict.string: Meet other backpackers and travelers from different parts of the world...
All-female and all-male rooms available, with double bunk beds to accomodate 4 guests per room
Easy access to subway, with a direct line from the airport...
Rooms can be booked for days or even longer periods for a discount....
Kitchen is available for all guests....
All rooms are equipped with WiFi, personal lockers, and air-conditioning...
Right across the street from Gongdeok subway station, with easy access to major tourist sites...
Located in a quiet area with quick access to major tourist sites...
